testcase.classname: Feature to test Form Page funcionality
testcase.name: User fills the in an improper way
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in the home page of "automationPractice"..................passed Given the user navigates to the contact form page...........................passed And does not fill all text fields properly..................................passed When the user clicks the submit button......................................passed Then then the "error" message "There is 1 error" is displayed to the customer.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Form Page funcionality
testcase.name: User fills the form with invalid email
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in the home page of "automationPractice"..................passed Given the user navigates to the contact form page...........................passed When and fills the email field in an invalid way............................passed Then the email field is highlited warning an error..........................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test Form Page funcionality
testcase.name: User fills the form Submit Error
testcase.system-out: Given the user is in the home page of "automationPractice"..................passed Given the user navigates to the contact form page...........................passed And fills all text fields properly..........................................passed When the user clicks the submit button......................................passed Then then the "success" message "Your message has been successfully sent to our team." is displayed to the customer.passed
